string.value: Did you hear #b#p2091001##k, the mental strength trainer of Mu Lung, might need help?

#b#p2091001##k says he wants to test your progress and has asked that you defeat the Book Ghost and Sage Cat. He says the Book Ghost and the Sage Cat have mastered magic, so defeating them won't be as easy as you think.

#o6130209# #r#a98501##k 
#o5120506# #r#a98502##k
You have returned after defeating the Book Ghost and the Sage Cat, but he said you needed to continue training, as that's the only way for you to become a master.
How is the training going? You seem surprised that you can hear me from here. Ah, this is nothing when you are a master like me. But that is not important now.
Becoming a master is no easy task... I would like to test your training by pitting you against those who are stronger but...

Not trying to avoid difficult training is a good attitute to have! Since I've asked you to go up against the Sage Cat before, I'm sure you are aware of the strange monsters that exist past the Peach Farm near Mu Lung...
The monsters out there have mastered magic, giving them powers that surpasses that of humans. Why don't you try training against them? Defeat #r100 #o6130209#s#k and #r100 #o05120506#s#k.
If you do not need my instruction, that is fine...
